subject: Reorganize UI colors for better semantic meaning
body:
Changed color usage to follow clear semantic guidelines:
- Accent (teal): Positive/creative actions (Create/Join Chat, Send button)
- Secondary (magenta-pink): Destructive/warning actions (End Chat, error states, unread badges)
- Primary (blue): Neutral actions (Copy Code button)

Key changes:
- Create Chat and Join Chat buttons: secondary → accent
- Send message button: secondary → accent
- Copy Code button: secondary → primary
- All loading spinners: secondary → accent
- Refresh/Try Again buttons: secondary → accent
- End Chat button: kept as secondary (destructive action)
- Unread badges: kept as secondary (attention-grabbing)
title: Reorganize UI colors for better semantic meaning
